subject: Re: ClassNotFound Exception in junit target of antscript
msgSnippet: Sussed it. My problem was that I didn t have the test .class file on the classpath in the ant script, as soon as I added that it started running my tests. Tim.

Sussed it.

My problem was that I didn't have the test .class file on the
classpath in the ant script, as soon as I added that it started
running my tests.

Tim.
